Meteara: Yes... I sense we are near...

They were standing on top of a cliff. The sea below was raging and 
iceberg were breaking because of the many waves.

Meteara: I hope you or your dog do not fear cold. The sphere is down 
there.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: If you don't get the "hazy shade of winter" reference don't 
feel bad but 
> don't ask.
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        "Well for one thing, you're looking at the clock not the 
range-finder. 
>  That is over here."  He gestures at another console.  He looks out 
the front 
> viewport.  "And since I can see the polar region in front of us I'd 
say we're 
> about there."  He sets the ship down on the ice sheet and opens the 
hatch.  
> He gets up and wanders outside.  "But look around, leaves are brown, 
it's a 
> hazy shade of winter.  Uh ... well technically there aren't any 
leaves but 
> that's okay.  We have arrived."
